titleStmt.title: A letter written to a friend in Wilts upon occasion of a late ridiculous pamphlet, wherein was inserted a pretended prophecie of Thomas Becket's, &c.
titleStmt.author: Tully, T. (Thomas), 1620-1676.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T.T. (i.e. Thomas Tully).
A reply to: The Prophecie of Thomas Becket, Arch-Bishop of Canterbury in the reign of King Henry the second.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
